main_definition: Being of assistance or providing aid to someone in need.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Making a positive difference through assistance
meanings_and_examples.example: The helpful volunteer spent hours packaging food for the local shelter.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Ready to assist or provide aid
meanings_and_examples.example: A helpful hand offered to guide me in using this new software.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Conducive to helping others; easy to help with
meanings_and_examples.example: The layout of the office is very helpful, making it easier for staff to assist customers.
She was extremely helpful in explaining the complex project details to me.
His supportive attitude and willingness to help were very helpful for our team's victory.
